document.full_text: the kansas city royals' youth movement gained more speed with 22-year-old left-hander danny duffy poised to start wednesday's game against the texas rangers, the american league central club said on tuesday.
document.title: pitcher duffy latest to join royals' rookie parade
lines_and_colors: the kansas city royals' youth movement gained more speed with 22-year-old left-hander danny duffy poised to start wednesday's game against the texas rangers, the american league central club said on tuesday.
